title: IBM Cloud CLI docs
introduction: Use IBM Cloud's powerful CLIs and tooling to interact with your applications, containers, infrastructure, and other services

section_recommended.title: Getting started with the IBM Cloud CLI
section_recommended.description: Install the IBM Cloud Command Line Interface, along with the option to install popular plug-ins and tools so that you can work with apps.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud CLI commands
section_recommended.description: IBM Cloud CLI commands to create, manage, deploy, debug, and test applications.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with IBM Cloud Shell
section_recommended.description: IBM Cloud Shell is a cloud-based shell workspace that's preconfigured with the full IBM Cloud CLI and several plug-ins and tools.

section_recommended.title: Troubleshooting for the IBM Cloud CLI
section_recommended.description: See solutions to common problems with using the IBM Cloud Command Line Interface.
